about_the_game:
ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival
Dive into a world consumed by darkness and chaos in ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival, the ultimate hack and slash zombie game that will push your combat skills to the limit. Armed with your trusty katana, you must carve a path through hordes of undead monstrosities in a desperate struggle for survival.

🗡️ Unleash the Katana Mastery: The Katana is your weapon of choice, and it's not just a tool – it's an extension of your very being. Master the art of the blade as you customize your katana with unique upgrades, each enhancing your combat style. Will you go for lightning-fast strikes or devastating critical blows?

🧟 Survive Together or Alone: Face the apocalypse on your terms. Team up with friends to create a fearsome squad of survivors, or tackle the dangers solo as you rely solely on your own skills and instincts. The choice is yours, but remember, strength often lies in numbers.

⚔️ Dynamic Combat System: Engage in heart-pounding battles with an intuitive and fluid combat system. Dodge, parry, and execute precise strikes to dismantle your enemies with style. Every encounter is a dance of death, and your blade is the conductor.

🌆 Variety of Challenges: It's not just about surviving; it's about thriving in the midst of chaos. Test your mettle against ever-increasing waves of zombies, from slow-moving biters to relentless runners. Engage in thrilling time trials with parkour elements that demand precision and speed, or choose to take on a single undead foe in a duel of skill.

🌟 Customization and Progression: Develop your character's abilities as you progress, unlocking new combat techniques, special moves, and passive skills. Enhance your katana's power and appearance as you face more formidable foes, turning your blade into a true instrument of destruction.

🏆 Leaderboards and Achievements: Compete with players from around the world as you climb the leaderboards and earn achievements for your exceptional feats. Show the world your prowess in combat and your mastery of survival tactics.

The world as you know it has fallen to the relentless tide of the undead. It's time to rise from the shadows and become a true survivor in ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival. Are you ready to forge your destiny and carve your legacy amidst the apocalypse? The katana's call awaits – embrace it, and let the blades of survival sing.

Sharpen your skills, customize your blade, and fight for survival in a world overrun by zombies. Join the fray in ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival!

content_descriptors.notes: The most mature content in this game would be occasional swearing, and the zombies you attack being damaged. There is no gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The displayed specs are the lowest level specs that I have run the game on, and maintained a solid 60 fps.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 8-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Default PC Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: I am unaware of the minimum specs to run the game as I have only tested it on my game, and do not know some of these. Please check constantly as I get an updated idea of these stats.

short_description: Survive the undead onslaught! Customize your katana, team up or go solo. Hack through zombies, master combat, and dominate the leaderboards in ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival.
